name: Bijoux Eyeshadow Palette
slogan: NARS’ largest eyeshadow palette ever.
usage: Apply shadow directly on top of primer to create full intensity that lasts all day. The versatile formula can be used as an eyeshadow or liner, applied wet or dry.
details:
The MECCA view:
Strike it rich with a palette of sixteen limited-edition intensely pigmented eyeshadows in decadent jewel tones and velvety neutrals in matte, satin, and shimmer finishes, plus glitter toppers. Swipe and shade your way to style.
 
Palette shades:
Under your skin (shimmering beige silver)
Devotion (sparkling antique gold)
Copycat (shimmering rose)
Fuel the fire (sparkling amber)
Do it again (light pink satin)
Limelight (sparkling pink/gold)
Pandemonium (shimmering amethyst
Thrill seeker (light forest green matte)
Dirty deeds (mauve matte)
On fire (shimmering burnt orange)
Get hot (ruby satin)
Midnight rider (shimmering emerald)
Idolized (shimmering cocoa)
Go deep (burnt sienna matte)
Girl gang (cocoa matte)
Powerhouse (deep brown satin)

Pair it with:
NARS Smudge Proof Eyeshadow Base
NARS #20 All Over Eyeshadow Brush
Nars Summer Solstice Cheek Duo

name: High Profile Cheek Palette
slogan: A holiday-themed limited-edition cheek palette.
usage:
Use #16 Blush Brush to apply your selected shade of Blush to the apples of the cheek.
Sweep any excess across the hairline, bridge of the nose and chin.
To enhance your glow, swirl #14 Bronzer Brush or Yachiyo Kabuki Brush over two or more shades in the palette and buff on cheeks.

name: Afterglow Lip Shine Set
slogan: A trio of NARS Afterglow Lip Shine favourites.
usage:
Apply Afterglow Lip Shine to bare lips for a sheer wash of color.
Start in the center of your upper lip and apply color from the center to the outer edges, following the contours of your mouth. Repeat on lower lip.
To add shine and subtle illuminating effects, apply as a topcoat over other lip colors.

name: Soft Matte Complete Foundation
slogan: 16-hour wear matte foundation.
usage: Dispense a small amount on to the back of your hand. One drop delivers full coverage with fingertip application. PAT product with fingertips. Start at the center of the face and gently PRESS the foundation on skin. Use a stippling motion to BLEND outward. Work in small sections, focusing on one area at a time. After each use, wipe off excess product from nozzle and close cap tightly.
details:
The MECCA view:
NARS debuts a breakthrough oil-free matte foundation with this high-performing, full-coverage formula. Crafted to leave you with a skin-like finish that not only mimics a healthy-looking complexion but delivers it too thanks to NARS’ Anti-Oxidation Complex and the Hydramatte Balancing Complex. The Anti-Oxidation Complex helps prevent colour shifting while protecting skin from pollution and blue-light damage while the Hydramatte Balancing Complex balances excess sebum and keeps skin hydrated with a combination of micro-algae and bio hyaluronic acid. Coupled with superior oil absorbing powders the formula serves up 16-hour wear that creates a smooth, mattified, second-skin look that’s transfer- and shine-proof.

Key ingredients:
Superior oil absorbing powders: help absorb the appearance of excess sebum for a lasting mattifying effect so complexion stays fresh.
Optimal diffusing powder: maximizes light diffusion with spherical surface powders designed to absorb and refract light for an instant blurring effect that creates a smooth, second-skin appearance.
Micro-algae extract: helps balance the appearance of excess sebum so skin looks renewed and perfected.
Bio hyaluronic acid: helps hydrate skin and maintain its moisture balance, so complexion looks bright and smooth.

Pair it with:
NARS Radiance Primer
NARS Light Reflecting Pressed Setting Powder
NARS Soft Matte Complete Concealer
ingredients: Water/aqua/eau, dimethicone, methyl methacrylate crosspolymer, trimethylsiloxysilicate, glycerin, lauryl peg-9 polydimethylsiloxyethyl dimethicone, sodium chloride, bis-butyldimethicone polyglyceryl-3, oryza sativa (rice) bran extract, helianthus annuus (sunflower) extract, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract, plankton extract, alteromonas ferment extract, peg-12 dimethicone, peg-10 dimethicone, butylene glycol, aluminum hydroxide, polysilicone-2, disteardimonium hectorite, barium sulfate, tocopherol, hydrogen dimethicone, sodium acetylated hyaluronate, alumina, glucose, hydrolyzed pea protein, sodium succinate, phenoxyethanol, [+/- (may contain/peut contenir): iron oxides (ci 77491), iron oxides (ci 77492), iron oxides (ci 77499), mica, titanium dioxide (ci 77891)]

name: Soft Matte Tinted Lip Balm
slogan: A soft matte lip balm available in nude shades.
usage:
Apply directly onto lips for the perfect amount of diffused matte lip color in just one swipe.
Apply any shade of Soft Matte Tinted Lip Balm to bare lips for a sheer tint of color or as a base under any lip shade.
Tap Soft Matte Tinted Lip Balm onto cheeks with fingertips for a natural-looking flush of color.
details:
The MECCA view:
Swipe on this sheer matte lip balm that delivers a wash of nude lip colour with a diffused and blurred finish. Available in a spectrum of shades that are suitable for all skin tones. 
Key ingredients:Amino acid powder: amplifies formula’s silky texture for optimal spreadability.
Olive oil wax: boosts creaminess without feeling greasy or sticky.
Bamboo fibers: impart a diffused, soft-focus effect due to their ability to absorb moisture.
Pair it with:
NARS Blush
NARS Sheer Glow Foundation
NARS Climax Mascara

slogan: A matte black liquid eyeliner.
usage: Use the tip of the brush to create thin lines and precise details. Gently push the tip in between lashes to add natural definition to the lashline. For optimal application, store liner lying horizontally when not in use.

name: Translucent Loose Setting Powder
slogan: Best-selling setting powder with no flashback.
usage:
Press an application puff into the powder, working the product into the puff by tapping on the back of the hand, then gently press into the skin. 
Pairs perfectly with the Velour Puff.
details:
The MECCA view:
An ultra-lightweight, finely-milled powder adds a hint of sheer, matte coverage and sets makeup without settling in fine lines or looking cakey. Ideal for photos with it's no-flashback formula and soft-focus technology which blurs the appearance of fine lines and imperfections for up to 23 hours. Available in two shades to perfectly set any skin tone: Translucent for fair to medium and tan skin tones, and Translucent Medium Deep for medium to deep skin tones. Dermatologist tested.
Want to know more? Chat to our in-store team for personalised application advice now.
Made without: 
Oils.
Pair it with:
Charlotte Tilbury The Air-Brush
Laura Mercier Velour Puff
Charlotte Tilbury Lip Cheat
Direct from the brand:
Be sure to check if you’ve applied enough by touching the cheek — the area should feel smooth. If the area feels tacky to the touch, then you need more powder. 
- Laura Mercier, Founder
Awards:
Voted “Best Makeup Extender” by you in the MECCA Beauty Election 2020.

details:
The MECCA view:
Ask any MECCA beauty junkie to name their most coveted complexion products and chances are NARS will be high up on the list, especially when it comes this stand-out tinted moisturiser. The advanced, oil-free formula provides a translucent veil of colour and gives a radiant, luminous finish. Infused with natural botanicals and hydrating extracts, it grants a bright, natural-looking glow. Think: your skin almost bare, but better.
Expert tip:
Add an alluring glow and extend the wear of your makeup for up to 16 hours by mixing one pump of NARS Tinted Glow Booster into your tinted moisturiser. 
Key ingredients:
Light-diffusing pigments: blur and soften the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and pores. 
Mineral rich sea water: revives the complexion leaving it softer, smoother and brighter.
Kopara from French Polynesia: hydrates skin and encourages natural cell renewal for a healthier looking complexion.

Made without:
Oil, parabens and synthetic fragrance. 

Pair it with:
NARS Radiant Creamy Concealer
NARS Radiance Primer
Hourglass Ambient Lighting Powder

“For added glow, mix in a small amount of NARS Illuminator before application.” – Tybion, Colour Specialist at MECCA Booragoon.

name: Optimal Brightening Concentrate
slogan: Instantly brighten your complexion.
usage: Apply 2-3 drops over face and neck every morning and evening. Massage and press the serum into the skin. Follow with your moisturiser.
details:
The MECCA view:
Infused with NARS Light Reflecting Complex™, this radiance-boosting serum instantly brightens skin and revitalises the complexion. Potent multi-action vitamin C clarifies and evens skin tone whilst working to prevent and repair visible signs of ageing. Dark spots begin to fade from view and skin appears youthful and luminous.

Key ingredients:
NARS exclusive Light Reflecting Complex™: restores youthful radiance so skin looks revived and luminous. 
Vitamin C: brightens as it helps fade the appearance of dark spots and discolourations, and helps prevent new spots from forming.
Noni fruit extract and plankton extract: revitalise and boost cellular energy, helping cells perform at their optimal level. 

Made without:
Oils, parabens and synthetic fragrance.

Pair it with:
NARS Purifying Foam Cleanser
NARS Aqua Gel Luminous Oil-Free Moisturiser
NARS Total Replenishing Eye Cream

Deeply hydrating yet quick to absorb, this eye cream is clinically proven to minimise the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, and puffiness, whilst working to boost the skin’s natural collagen production. With a plethora of naturally derived active ingredients ready to work their magic, skin appears brighter and more luminous.

Bio-hyaluronic acid: attracts and retains water in the skin creating a more supple appearance.

Oil, alcohol, synthetic fragrance, sulphates and parabens.

name: Moisture Surge™ 100H Auto-Replenishing Hydrator
slogan: A deeply hydrating and nourishing gel-cream.
usage: Use morning and night on clean skin. Can be used under or over makeup and also as a 5-minute mask.
details:
The MECCA view:
An oil-free, gel-cream that serves up 100 hours of hydration whilst penetrating deep within the skin's surface layers (up to 10 layers deep). It's lightweight and formulated with a blend of aloe ferment and hyaluronic acid to plump and hydrate. The best part? skin is still left hydrated even after washing your face. 

Key ingredients:
Aloe bio-ferment: helps infuse skin with moisture. 
Hyaluronic acid: has the unique ability to hold 1,000 times its weight in water, helping to create a “moisture reservoir” for ideal hydration.
Activated aloe water: holds both positive and negative ionic charges which helps skin absorb moisture more easily.
Auto-replenishing technology: using activated aloe water and caffeine, it helps trigger skin’s own rehydration system.
Made without:
Parabens, phthalates and fragrance.
Consumer testing results:

Boosts moisture by +174%.**
Provides 100 hours of hydration.
Provides a smooth canvas for makeup application.
Same lightweight, addictive, oil-free gel-cream texture.

99% of women said skin felt deeply hydrated.***
95% of women said skin looked plump.***
91% of women said skin looked glowing.***
98% of women said skin felt more resilient.***
95% of women said skin felt healthier.***

*Into skin’s surface; in vitro testing after 30 minutes.

name: Moisture Surge Overnight Mask
slogan: Get a soft and dewy glow by morning.
usage:
Gently dispense a 20-cent-piece-sized amount of product and smooth over cleansed, exfoliated skin in a thin layer, avoiding the eye area. If using on neck and decolletage, use another 20-cent-piece-sized amount.

Leave for 30 minutes or overnight. Remove with a cloth and warm water, following with serum and moisturiser.
details:
The MECCA view:
Go to sleep wrapped in this ultra-hydrating mask and wake up radiant and refreshed. Formulated with a buttery-rich yet oil-free texture, this overnight mask penetrates the skin deeply to replenish lost moisture and soothe irritation. Infused with anti-oxidants and sodium hyaluronate, your skin will build its own natural moisture barrier and resist harmful irritants. Perfect for long haul flights or pre-wedding nights!

Key ingredients: 
Sodium hyaluronate: a hyaluronic acid derivative that works like a sponge, absorbing hydration and slowly drip-feeding it to the deeper layers of the skin. 
Vitamin E: chief skin soother and hydrator, this key ingredient smooths the skin, breaks down redness and helps soften scars.
Glycerin: a skin-identical hydrator that works hard to lock in moisture within the deep layers of the skin, for a radiant complexion that lasts. 

Made without:
Parabens, phthalates and fragrance.

Pair it with:
Korres Greek Yoghurt Foaming Cream Cleanser
Tatcha Violet C Brightening Serum

details:

Go big or go home with this featherlight styling spray, delivering a surge of instant volume for big body and texture that will outlast your plans. Powered by Living Proof’s Volumizing + Texturizing Molecule, which creates big volume by increasing the space between hair strands. Ideal for fine, flat hair and anyone seeking volume and texture.

name: Full Dry Volume Blast
slogan: A weightless hair mist for lift, body and bounce
usage:
Shake can well before each spray. Hold canister 10' away from dry hair. Section hair, lift & spray roots to ends. Repeat until desired style is achieved making sure to shake can between each spray. Tousle hair with your fingers. Spray on finished styles for extra texture and hold.

Full Dry Volume Blast is buildable. Start with a little, and add on, depending on how much volume and texture you want in your style. 

Spray Full Dry Volume Blast throughout hair in an upwards motion, not down onto hair. 

If experiencing too much texture, hold can further away from head and apply in a sweeping motion.

name: Eye Obsessed 12-Piece Eye Brush Collection + Bag
slogan: 12 eyeshadow brush set in a travel friendly bag.
usage:
Pick up your favourite brush and eyeshadow palette, and start from there! For the increased colour intensity, wet a synthetic brush to pick up colour.

Blender: fluffy and tapered, best for applying shadows into the crease and blending out edges.
Small shader: dense and soft, this brush is perfect for building intense colour and achieving precise application— perfect for the inner corners!

Liner/brow: thin and angled, best used for precision application of liner and brow products.

name: Smudge Brush #25
slogan: Smudge and blur liners and shadows.
usage:
If using a powder, apply colour to the tip of the brush, tapping off excess, and gently deposit colour along the lash line gradually applying more colour to build intensity. If using a pencil, use this brush to gently blur and diffuse harsh lines for a smooth, seamless finish.
To cleanse your NARS Brushes, dispense a small amount of gentle soap (or your favorite makeup brush shampoo) onto brush and rinse with water until water runs clean. Avoid wetting the handle of the brush. Gently reshape fibers after rinsing. Lay flat or hang upside down to dry.

name: #16 Blush Brush
slogan: A dome-shaped blush brush for expert application
usage: Apply powder to the tip of the brush, tap off excess and apply to your cheeks.
details:
The MECCA view:
Featuring high quality and durable synthetic fibres, this dense dome-shaped brush is perfect for depositing the perfect amount of pigment to your cheeks. Use this to blend, smooth and diffuse for an effortless application. The fibres are hypoallergenic and are great to use on sensitive skin. 
Pair it with:
NARS Blush
NARS Orgasm X Cheek Palette
NARS Orgasm Illuminating Loose Powder Blush

name: Mie Kabuki Brush
slogan: Fluffy kabuki brush for application of powers.
usage:
To set the face, lightly sweep with powder. To add colour to the cheeks, simply swipe across product and build up until desired flush or bronze is achieved.
To cleanse your NARS Brushes, dispense a small amount of gentle soap (or your favorite makeup brush shampoo) onto brush and rinse with water until water runs clean. Avoid wetting the handle of the brush. Gently reshape fibers after rinsing. Lay flat or hang upside down to dry.
details:
The MECCA view:
This soft brush is ideal for even application of loose and pressed powders across the face and cheeks. With a hand-spun wisteria handle, the Mie brush preserves the traditional character of the Japanese kabuki, beautifully melding heritage with modernity.

Pair it with:
NARS Bronzing Powder
NARS Soft Velvet Loose Powder
NARS Orgasm Illuminating Loose Powder Blush

name: Ita Kabuki Brush
slogan: Contour, sculpt and define.
usage:
Apply contour powder to the tip of the brush and tap off excess. Place the brush into the area you would like to contour and wiggle to push the product into your skin. Follow with long sweeping movements to ensure a seamless blend. 
To cleanse your NARS Brushes, dispense a small amount of gentle soap (or your favorite makeup brush shampoo) onto brush and rinse with water until water runs clean. Avoid wetting the handle of the brush. Gently reshape fibers after rinsing. Lay flat or hang upside down to dry.
details:
The MECCA view:
A small, flat brush featuring synthetic fibres, designed for controlled application of face powder and colour. Use this for blending, contouring and highlighting.

Pair it with:
NARS Bronzing Powder
NARS Highlighting Powder
NARS Soft Velvet Loose Powder

name: Eye Crease Brush
slogan: Define and diffuse your crease with ease.
usage: Hold the brush at the center of the handle or closer to the ferrule. Pinch the brush handle between thumb and middle finger. For added control, also use pointer finger with a light touch on handle, this will act more as a guide during application.
details:
The MECCA view:
This specialty brush is designed to highlight the crease of the eye for an enhanced eye look. Its tapered bristles allow for precise application and seamless blending of product for a defined yet diffused eye look.

Pair it with:
NARS Single Eyeshadow
Laura Mercier Parisian Nudes Eyeshadow Palette
Mecca Cosmetica Brush With Success

name: Powder Brush
slogan: Soft powder brush for versatile application.
usage: Press brush into powder, then press onto the back of the hand to push the product into the bristles. Tap once on the hand to shake off excess product then press into the skin and blend.
details:
The MECCA view:
This sculpted brush softly and easily applies power to the skin, perfect for both setting the make-up and layering additional complexion products. While it is specifically designed for use with loose setting powders, this brush will apply product to the whole face as well as those tighter spots.

Pair it with:
Laura Mercier Translucent Loose Setting Powder
Hourglass Veil Translucent Setting Powder
Mecca Cosmetica Brush With Success

name: Flawless Finish Makeup Sponge
slogan: An innovative, dye-free makeup sponge.
usage:
Use sponge dampened or dry, picking up product from back of hand. Use s-shaped side to apply product, stippling onto desired areas. Use top edge or bottom pointed tip to target smaller areas around the eyes and nose.

Wash regularly with soap and water for the most hygienic application.
details:
The MECCA view:
This intuitively-shaped sponge is designed hug the contours of the face for smooth, even product application and a naturally blended complexion. While the s-shaped curve fits along the contour of the cheekbone, the sponge’s edges are perfect for reaching smaller areas, such as the sides of the nose and underneath the eye. 
Key feature:
Advanced Zero Cell Technology: means that the sponge will absorb minimal product, ensuring more makeup goes on skin and wastage is minimised.

Made without:
Fragrance, dye and latex.

Pair it with:
Mecca Cosmetica To Save Face SPF50+ Superscreen
Laura Mercier Flawless Lumière Radiance-Perfecting Foundation
NARS Sheer Glow Foundation

name: Cheek Colour Brush
slogan: A soft and durable medium sized brush.
usage: Dip brush into cheek product and apply to the desired area.
details:
The MECCA view: 
The sculpted head design, applies the perfect amount of product smoothly and precisely to the cheekbones. It is a medium sized brush head that allows for the perfect application every time. 

Key feature:
Synthetic fibre. 
Pair it with: 
Laura Mercier Blush Infusion
Laura Mercier Face IlluminatorLaura Mercier Matte Radiance Baked Powder

name: Blending Brush
slogan: Buff powder products into the skin with ease.
usage: Press the brush into the powder to pick up the product. Next press the brush onto the back of hand to work the powder into the brush. This will ensure powder is loaded into the bristles and minimise any fallout. Tap and press loaded bristle all over the area and then blend.
details:
The MECCA view: 
This fluffy blending brush buffs powder products into the skin with ease, including setting powder and powder foundation. Designed with a rounded head and small handle, movement is maximised meaning your powder is applied exactly where you want it.
Pair it with: 
Laura Mercier Translucent Loose Setting Powder
Laura Mercier Smooth Finish Foundation Powder
Mecca Cosmetica Brush With Success

name: Angled Cheek Colour Brush
slogan: A multi-tasking cheek saviour.
usage: This brush has been designed to effortlessly highlight and contour the face.
details:
The MECCA view:
This multi-tasking angled brush is the new best friend to your favourite bronzer and highlighting products. Designed with a slanted round shape to mimic the angles of your cheekbones, contouring and highlighting is precise yet effortless time after time.

Pair it with:
Mecca Cosmetica Brush With Success
Nars Bronzing Powder
Laura Mercier Powder Brush

name: Mojave Ghost Hand Cream
slogan: Ignite passion, bring to life eclectic notes.
usage: Apply to hands as frequently as desired.
details:
The MECCA view:
Challenge what you know about florals with this spiced, clean bouquet. The beautiful scent of ambrette, Jamaican nesberry, violet, sandalwood, magnolia base, chantilly musk, crisp amber and cedarwood are balanced for a cool finish. Byredo's commitment to bringing a memory to life through aroma isn't limited to traditional Eau de parfums, unleash your favourite scent in this nourishing hand lotion to treat and delicately fragrance the skin. This delicately scented, sensuous hydrator brings to life Mojave Ghost, one of Byredo's signature scents. A totally weightless formula that leaves the hands and cuticles nourished and luminous. The long-lasting scent comes in a chic minimalist tube for on the go.

Fragrance notes:
Ambrette, Jamaican nesberry, violet, sandalwood, magnolia base, chantilly musk, crisp amber, cedarwood.

Made without:
Phthalates and parabens.
Pair it with: 
BYREDO Mojave Ghost EDP
BYREDO Mojave Ghost Body Wash
BYREDO Roll On Oil Mojave Ghost

Byredo's commitment to bringing a memory to life through aroma isn't limited to traditional eau de parfums— unleash your favourite scent in this nourishing hand cream to treat and delicately fragrance the skin. This totally weightless formula brings to life Vetyver, one of Byredo's signature scents, and leaves the hands and cuticles nourished. The long-lasting scent comes in a chic minimalist bottle to compliment your space.

name: Rose Rinse Free Hand Wash
slogan: Chic cleansing on the go.
usage: Apply one drop of product onto the hands and apply evenly on both hands for an immediate clean and fresh feel. Thoroughly massage into palms, backs of hands, and between fingers. Avoid broken skin.
details:
The MECCA view:
Cleanse your hands on the go without compromising on hydration. A unique alcohol-based formula that gently cleanses the hands and dries fast. Containing gentle moisturising agents to hydrate the hands while cleansing. The luxurious scent features pink pepper, rose heart and raspberry, with base notes of patchouli and white musk housed in a chic tube.

Please note that this product contains 30% alcohol and is not intended to be anti-bacterial. This product does not prevent the spread of infectious diseases, bacteria or viruses.

Fragrance notes:
Pink pepper, rose heart and raspberry.

Made without:
Parabens.

Pair it with:

name: Neroli Lumiere Body Wash
slogan: A refreshing, natural body wash.
usage: Massage all over the body, rinse clean.
details:
Bastide is exclusive to MECCA

The MECCA view: 
Give your skin the gift of a natural, nourishing cleanse with this luxurious neroli scented body wash, made with 97.5% natural ingredients. This unique silky formula, made with Provence olive oil and coconut oil, will nourish and clean your skin naturally. The transportive fragrances match Bastide’s Eau de Toilettes for an aromatic experience in the shower, creating a sensorial delight out of an everyday routine. The natural formula gently glides, cleanses, and protects the skin.

Fragrance notes:
Neroli, orange blossom, jasmine, lemon, pink grapefruit, cassis, amber and blonde woods.

Made without:
Parabens, silicones, sulphates, mineral oil, phthalates and petrolatum.

Pair it with:
Bastide Neroli Lumiere EDT
Bastide Neroli Lumiere Solid Soap
Bastide Creme Intense
ingredients: Polyglyceryl-3 caprylate, caprylyl/capryl glucoside, benzyl alcohol, tetrasodium glutamate diacetate, potassium olivate, cocos nucifera (coconut)oil, olea europaea (olive) fruit oil.
